name: SUGARQUEST
description:
SUGARQUEST is a fairy tale with LGBT themes and characters.

Princess Amarah is waiting for true happiness, but can her knight deliver such a thing?

--

Please note that this is a very early alpha build. In other words, this game is still in development, and there are many updates to come in future! Stay tuned for lots more content.

Created to be part of the #onedayjam2016 charity bundle.

Everybody who purchases this game will receive the full game upon completion, free of charge.

--

All art, writing and programming by me, Casper Mashhadi

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com

Sigh sound effect created by Otakua of freesound.org, released under the Creative Commons attribution license

--

REDUCED TO FREE WHILE DEVELOPMENT IS ON HOLD
